Sasuke expels a [[Chidori]] into the air. He moves extremely fast in a zig-zag pattern, such that he leaves after-images. He attacks the opponent with only one strike. This technique, combined with Sasuke's speed, makes it extremely difficult, if not impossible to avoid.

== Trivia ==
* It looks similar in appearance to the [[Lightning Cutter One Flash]] from ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3]]''.<ref>''Naruto'' gamebook, page 52</ref>
